products.title: Geometric Metallic Sterling Grey Curtain
products.description: A fantastic neutral, this textured geometric fabric is simple yet effective at creative depth, whilst adding a soft pop of colour to your home. Your new geometric metallic sterling silver curtain, blends a striking silver shade with interwoven reflective silver threadwork to help create a modern, inspiring final look. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new curtaincomes with a fabulous five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind.
